ST. LOUIS COUNTY • Authorities on Monday released surveillance images of a weekend bank robbery in an effort to identify the bandit .
A man entered a First Bank branch at 4090 North Highway 67 about 10 a.m. Saturday , police said .
He gave a teller a note demanding money .
